detectors.description:
SafeMath.sub(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DappChannel__3.sol#22-25) has assert violation
	Assert violations:
	- assert(bool)(b <= a) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DappChannel__3.sol#23)

SafeMath.div(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DappChannel__3.sol#15-20) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- c = a / b (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DappChannel__3.sol#17)

detectors.description: Parameter StandardToken.balanceOf(address)._owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DappChannel__3.sol#75) is not in mixedCase

detectors.description:
balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DappChannel__3.sol#75-77)
	- Token.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DappChannel__3.sol#39)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DappChannel__3.sol#59-68)
	- Token.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DappChannel__3.sol#40)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- Token.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DappChannel__3.sol#41)
	- StandardToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DappChannel__3.sol#121-123)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DappChannel__3.sol#108-113)
	- Token.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DappChannel__3.sol#43)
